# filenamr 0.1.0.9001 (2023-03-20)

* Export `check_path_fileext()` function.
* Remove `str_fileext` functions (moved to [{isstatic}](https://github.com/elipousson/isstatic) package)

# filenamr 0.1.0.9000 (2023-03-15)

* Initial release.
